Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value and performance. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it directly from us for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and innovation that went into creating this product. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and provide you with significant benefits. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
